name: Dance Of Death: Du Lac & Fey - DLC - Art Book
detailed_description: The Dance of Death: Du Lac & Fey art book is a complete guide to the visual production of the game, lifting the curtain on the development and design decisions that went in to creating Dance of Death’s unique visuals. Concept art, 3D models, graphic design, UI – the list is endless, all accompanied by juicy behind the scenes info from our developers. Beware, spoilers ahead!
about_the_game: The Dance of Death: Du Lac & Fey art book is a complete guide to the visual production of the game, lifting the curtain on the development and design decisions that went in to creating Dance of Death’s unique visuals. Concept art, 3D models, graphic design, UI – the list is endless, all accompanied by juicy behind the scenes info from our developers. Beware, spoilers ahead!
short_description: The Dance of Death: Du Lac & Fey art book is a complete guide to the visual production of the game, lifting the curtain on the development and design decisions that went in to creating Dance of Death’s unique visuals.

fullgame.name: Dance of Death: Du Lac & Fey

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Window 7 (64 bit only)
  • Processor: Intel Core i5-4430 / AMD FX-6300
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 960 2GB / AMD Radeon R7 370 2GB
  • DirectX: Version 10
  • Storage: 25 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: This is a pdf file
